title: Google\Cloud\Translate\V3\TranslateTextGlossaryConfig
name: TranslateTextGlossaryConfig
description:
Configures which glossary should be used for a specific target language, and defines options for applying that glossary.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.translation.v3.TranslateTextGlossaryConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.glossary
params.description: Required. The glossary to be applied for this translation. The format depends on glossary: - User provided custom glossary: projects/{project-number-or-id}/locations/{location-id}/glossaries/{glossary-id}

params.name: data.ignore_case
params.description: Optional. Indicates match is case-insensitive. Default value is false if missing.

methods.name: getGlossary
methods.description:
Required. The glossary to be applied for this translation.

The format depends on glossary:

  • User provided custom glossary: projects/{project-number-or-id}/locations/{location-id}/glossaries/{glossary-id}

Generated from protobuf field string glossary = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];
